article_title: Former President Bill Clinton speaks at USC
article_text:
In Fall 2016, USC's tuition will rise about $2,000. Do you think USC's administration is transparent with how tuition dollars are spent?

Yes

No View Results

og.description: The 42nd President and founder of the Clinton Foundation spoke on interdependence and cooperation, as well as issues in the global community.
